Detailed Description

Main component class.

Advanced table control implementation.
Features:

  1. composite rows/columns
  2. sorting and filtering
  3. MCV design (designed after Java(tm) JTable classes). Data accessed through wxAdvTableModel, rendered by wxAdvCellRenderer, edited by wxAdvCellEditor
  4. rows/columns dynamic add/remove support
  5. TODO: add printing support
  6. TODO: add filters support

NOTES: There are two types of cell coordinates: table and model. Table coordinate used everywhere in table, when you click on cell, when you access data through wxAdvTable::GetCellValue. Model coordinates used by model.
